EmailTemplate.name: 5.1.3 Reminder Autumn availability request
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder to register for Work Opportunities
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
,Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative on {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, REMINDER
WORK OPPORTUNITIES
We emailed you last week to invite you to register your interest in working on our Autumn programme.
If you haven't done this yet or would like to change your response please follow the link.
NB. You will not be required to attend training.
New Availability form: http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=1b49htgah35ov&q1={!Job_Application__c.Id}
CORE ROLES/YEAR ROUND ROLES
For full time roles please follow the link to the web site and look under 'Year round roles' for job description and application process.
Details of all the roles and dates can be found on our web site here.
http://www.the-challenge.org/index.php/support-us/work-for-us
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me.
Best wishes,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} The Challenge Network t: {!Contact.OwnerPhone} e: {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c} 5.1.3 Reminder/ Autumn/Core
